=== About Me ===
Am a programmer and an tech enthusiasts highly inspired by Linux and the open source. I have completed my B-Tech in Computer Science & Engineering (2009). Now working as an web developer and mainly focuses on the PHP + MySQL + Apache stack.

==== Current Project & Goals ====
I like to help people at the Launchpad answers.In the meantime I'm now actively contributing towards the Malayalam translation activities in Launchpad and I'm a member of the Launchpad Malayalam Translators group. Our ultimate aim as a group, is to make '''Ubuntu''', Kerala friendly by enabling complete Malayalam support in Ubuntu.
